name: What's Outside
description:
You’re stuck out in the middle of space alone with your ship and your crew, see how long you can survive and do it again.

Controls
  • WASD: For Movement
  • E:  pick up PowerUps
  • Mouse: To aim
  • Right click: To fire
  • Left click: To Block

For now, there is only a windows version.  If people are interest in this game, there will be more different platforms and more to be added to the game. And maybe a Steam page for later. 

 

Please report any game bugs.
